# init

**Instance Method**

Initializes the memory descriptor object.

## Declaration

```swift
bool init();
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if initialization was successful, or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] if it was unsuccessful.

## Discussion

Don’t call this method directly. To allocate a memory buffer for your driver, call the [doc://com.apple.driverkit/documentation/DriverKit/IOBufferMemoryDescriptor/Create] method of [doc://com.apple.driverkit/documentation/DriverKit/IOBufferMemoryDescriptor].

## Configuring the Buffer

- **free**: Performs any final cleanup for the memory descriptor object.
